name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Internal Alchemist
description:
A member of the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus, the secret sect that hid within the Xianzhou Luofu. 
With medicine, purify the heart. With elixir, transform one's body. They long to revive the ancient mysteries of Abundance, hoping to spur Xianzhou natives towards their next stage of evolution.

skills.name: Seeding Core
skills.description: Inflicts a single target with Spur of Thunderwoe.

skills.name: Thundering Reign
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Core Rupture
skills.description: Upon receiving a killing blow, this unit deals Lightning DMG to any targets that were inflicted with Spur of Thunderwoe by them. Afterward, Spur of Thunderwoe on these targets will be removed.
